title: $:/litClock/times/-15:45-Stephen King
quote_first: I opened my notebook, flipped almost to the end before I found a blank page, and wrote “October 5th,
quote_last: , Dunning to Longview Cem, puts flowers on parents' (?) graves. Rain.” I had what I wanted.

title: $:/litClock/times/-15:45-JG Ballard
quote_first: One meal is enough now, topped up with a glucose shot. Sleep is still ‘black’, completely unrefreshing. Last night I took a 16 mm. film of the first three hours, screened it this morning at the lab. The first true-horror movie. I looked like a half-animated corpse. Woke 10:25. To sleep
